title: Rainfall & seasonality
text: Umbrella facilitates access extraction CHIRPS rainfall data fitting seasonal profiles. package leans heavily data functionality : CHIRPS: Please see CHIRPS website information, usage rights citation infromation.

title: Rainfall & seasonality
text: Please install GitHub : estimate fourier series representing general seasonal profiles given rainfall setting using following equation  g0, g1, g2, g3, h1, h2, h3 fitted parameters. equation can fitted linear model using Rs lm function. However, impose additional constraint fitting: rainfall floor. sets minimum lower bound value rainfall. constraint fit resulting model optim() function.
